text: "(I Just) Died in Your Arms" is the 1986 debut single by English band Cutting Crew. It is the leading single from their debut studio album Broadcast. It went to number 1 in the United States, Norway, Canada and Finland, number 4 in the United Kingdom, Switzerland, South Africa and Germany, number 2 in Sweden and Ireland and number 8 in Australia. ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Debut singles Category:Pop rock songs Category:Smokie (band) songs Category:Bastille (band) songs
title: (I Just) Died in Your Arms
